channel.title: Home on Graham Brown
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Graham Brown

item.title: Is My Alarm Panel Smart?
item.description: In this modern world with the Internet everything has become smart.

item.title: Business Continuity in the COVID-19 pandemic
item.description: COVID-19 has forced many businesses to act on their continuity plans. Fortunately, as we operate mostly online we were able to execute a plan with relative ease.

item.title: UPS Monitoring
item.description: In order to run any computer you need power - so without power your computer is rendered useless, and that effectively renders a modern business dead too.

item.title: Asterisk Africa Community Conference 2018
item.description: I got to present at and attend the Asterisk Africa Community Conference 2018.

item.title: Hacktoberfest (Open source contribution)
item.description: Most businesses use Open Source Software in some way, whether it’s bundled in a product they purchased or using it directly, however not many give back to those projects…

item.title: Building a website with Hugo
item.description: When it comes to hosting a website there are many options - from using a database with a programming language that generates pages to hand editing pages or somewhere in-between.

item.title: Senior Developer & Solution Architect, ExiPay Technologies
item.description: Design, build and maintain a PCI certified payment switching platform.

item.title: Senior Developer & Solution Architect, ono//connect
item.description: Financail transaction switching and integraitions from merchant teminals to banks.

item.title: Developer & IT Operations, Different Life
item.description: Implement open source technologies and platforms to build an online life insurance system facilitated by a call centre.

item.title: BI Developer, ABSA
item.description: Contracting position where I helped apply software development best practices to aid the growth and reputability of the team.

item.title: Developer, Ledula
item.description: One of the 4 co-founders, I was everything from developer to barista - my responsibility was implementing the idea: finding service providers your friends trust.

item.title: Senior Management and IT Architect, healthbridge
item.description: Architecting systems for workflow integration and real-time data switching to aid proficient healthcare practice management and being an integral part of MANCO which involved strategic planning and driving company values.

item.title: Developer, healthbridge
item.description: Creating a framework to handle the complexities of multi-threading, configuration and message flow for real-time switching and implementing a customers portal. Found a way to minimise use of server resources by combining multiple applications into one but still allowing the flexibility to run independently too.

item.title: Support Engineer, healthbridge
item.description: Installing, maintaining and monitoring the server and network infrastructure. Integral in the Year 2000 preparation testing both hardware and software.
